label: 半済
本: Land, Power, and the Sacred The Estate System in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 2018
著者: Goodwin, Janet R. (ed.)/ Piggott, Joan R. (ed.)
説明文: “half tax.” Half of an estate proprietor’s rents were turned over to the military governor (shugo), in a system dating from the mid-fourteenth century.
